授業方法:
All lessons will be conducted on campus (face-to-face style). Google Classroom will be used for some assignment information and submissions, and also for regular contact with the teacher. Students need a Google account. This information will explained in detail during the first lesson. This course is centered mainly on discussions. Students will discuss their opinions and ideas in pairs and in small groups. Students will be involved in presentations and discussions throughout the semester.
*If the pandemic continues into Fall 2021 and classes need to be conducted online, all lessons will be done live using Zoom. The teacher will post updated information in LUNA and all students will be contacted individually by their KGU e-mail addresses to explain about online classes if on campus face-to-face classes are not possible in September, 2021.

トピック.授業計画1:
This class is conducted entirely in English and students will be expected to ONLY speak English during class. Students will be expected to actively participate in lengthy interactive discussions with classmates each lesson. This is NOT a lecture style course, it requires communicative discussions with classmates regularly 2 or 3 times each week.
Note: This syllabus may be subject to revisions according to student needs and abilities.
トピック.授業外学習2: This is an all-English course. You greatly enhance your acquisition of English by speaking it. In addition, speaking Japanese limits your classmates’ learning opportunities. Please encourage each other to speak English all the time you are in the classroom, especially for casual conversation! You lose participation points if you speak Japanese in class. Furthermore, students can expect to have an average of 30 minutes of preparation/homework before most classes. Some classes will require no preparation, and some classes will require a lot of preparation.
